緣.definition: cause; reason; karma; fate; predestined affinity; margin; hem; edge; along

緣分.definition: fate or chance that brings people together; predestined affinity or relationship; (Budd.) destiny

緣於.definition: to originate from; to come from the fact that; owing to; because of

緣木求魚.definition: lit. climb a tree to catch a fish (idiom); fig. to attempt the impossible

緣起.definition: to originate; origin; genesis; account of the origins of an endeavor
